messages.subject: Very useful maps (especially for Japanese readers)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone I am trying to compile a map of Japan during the sengoku jidai that I am happy with, the maps I have found are good but I always want them to go a
messages.messageBody:
Hi Everyone

I am trying to compile a map of Japan during the sengoku jidai
that I am happy with, the maps I have found are good but I always
want them to go a bit further listing more than the old province
names. Anyhow I have found this site which has links to loads of old
maps http://www.lib.duke.edu/ias/eac/jpnmap.htm it is excellent the
detail on the maps is superb, shame I can't read Japanese as well as
I'd like. Anyhow Edo stretts digital , from Tokyo university in
Tokyo has maps of samurai houses and daimyo residences cool I would
say. If anyone has any good maps I'd appreciate a post ,anyhow I'll
continue working on my project Later then.

Mark
